My Goals

All of my actions in life are based on these 4 principles:

1

Continuous Self-Development

I improve my skills every day: books, video courses on Coursera and Udemy, articles, etc.

I speak also 2 foreign languages

2

Achieving A Result

Consistently meeting objectives and success criteria within agreed deadlines.

Planning, prioritising, and organising workloads

3

Work-Life Balance

I love active lifestyle: new countries, mountains, etc.

Also I'm a marathon runner

4

Follow the dream

"You have to dream before your dreams can come true."

Never give up!
